en-AU.name: Space Facts
en-AU.description:
Ask for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Facts" or "Alexa, open Space Facts" or "Alexa, bore me" or \Give me useless facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop" or "I don't care anymore" or "Just stop"
